page.title: 02DECRIPTION OF BLOCK 2
page.content:
sites. The valley floor itself is quite wide and liable to flooding.Therefore it has not been used for housing, much of it being used playing fields and open space.
Kersal is a postwar council housing development, whilst Broughton has recently been cleared of much of the older Victorian terraced property which was in poor condition.
To the east on the slopes above the Irwell is Higher Broughton which was in the last century considered to be a desirable suburb for middle class Manchester and Salford citizens. Many of the houses built in this period remain.
